rock5a.name: Rock 5A
rock5a.board_description: The ROCK 5 Model A is based around the scaled down Rockchip RK3588S octa-core processor with quad Cortex A76 and a quad Cortex A55 and ARM Mali G610MC4 GPU and custom neural processor unit (NPU) and supports 8Kp60 video. It also has up to 16GB of 64bits LPDDR4x RAM on the board to support large AI frameworks.

rock5b.name: Rock 5B
rock5b.board_description: The ROCK 5 Model B, equipped with the RK3588 SoC and 8 cores, delivers exceptional power-efficient performance in a compact Pico ITX form factor.

rock_4c+.name: Rock 4C+
rock_4c+.board_description: The ROCK 4C+ is a reliable, multifunctional and high-performing single-board computer based on a robust Rockchip RK3399T SoC, Dual Cortex® A72 CPU and Arm Mali™ T860MP4 GPU. Developed by OKdo Technology in collaboration with Radxa, the board incorporates class-leading functionality suitable for multiple multimedia and industrial applications, ensuring outstanding reliability.

edge2.name: Khadas Edge 2
edge2.board_description: The Khadas Edge2 is a powerful SBC made by Khadas, it features the RK3588S SOC and up to 16GB of RAM. BredOS images are also available on oowow

vim4.name: Khadas VIM4
vim4.board_description: The Khadas VIM4  BredOS images are also available on oowow

orangepi5plus.name: Orange Pi 5 plus
orangepi5plus.board_description: The Orange Pi 5 plus is a single-board computer that features an upgraded Rockchip SoC, up to 32GB of RAM, faster WiFi, and other improvements over earlier versions of the Orange Pi ARM64 SBCs.
